scripts.scss:style: node-sass --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 --source-map maps --source-map-contents false --source-map-embed true --precision 6 sass/style.scss ./style.css
scripts.scss:woocommerce: node-sass --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 --source-map maps --source-map-contents false --source-map-embed true --precision 6 sass/woocommerce.scss ./woocommerce.css
scripts.uglify: mkdirp dist/js && uglifyjs js/*.js -m -o dist/js/app.js && uglifyjs js/*.js -m -c -o dist/js/app.min.js
scripts.lang: echo Update abdulay.pot file & wp-pot --src "**/*.php" --dest-file "languages/abdulay.pot" --domain abdulay --package "abdulay" --bug-report "leobrescia.com.br" --team "Leo Brescia <leonardo@leobrescia.com.br>"
scripts.build-css:style: node-sass --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 --source-map maps --source-map-contents true --precision 6 --omit-source-map-url sass/style.scss dist/abdulay/style.css
scripts.build-css:woocommerce: node-sass --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 --source-map maps --source-map-contents true --precision 6 --omit-source-map-url sass/woocommerce.scss dist/abdulay/woocommerce.css
scripts.build: run-s -l lang clean copy build-css:* archive
scripts.archive: echo Create abdulay.zip & cross-zip dist/abdulay dist/abdulay.zip
